name: Goodnight, Leo
description:
Hidden Tavern Games is a collaboration between  TooTicky2 and QuantumSno. We've got big plans, why not give us a follow to see where we go!

DEV NOTES

IK it says 'dev build' on the bottom right. For some reason it runs seemingly perfectly in this mode but not release mode. Working on a fix soon!

     Coding: Unity

     Art & Animation: Aseprite, Krita, Tahoma 2D

     Book pages, acrylic gelli monoprinting, collage, cardstock

     Music & SFX: Audacity, BFXR

     Credits: Dawnbringer 32 Palette,
